exitCriteria.notes: Exit if AAPL probability >20% (take profit) or <4% (stop loss), or at market resolution

positions.rationale: AAPL ($4.1-4.2T) only 5-7% behind NVDA ($4.44T). Market prices AAPL at 9% vs estimated 15-20% true probability. With 24 days to resolution, volatility could close gap. Testing hypothesis that multi-outcome markets misprice volatility in close races.

tradeHistory.rationale: AAPL ($4.1-4.2T) only 5-7% behind NVDA ($4.44T). Market prices AAPL at 9% vs estimated 15-20% true probability. With 24 days to resolution, volatility could close gap. Testing hypothesis that multi-outcome markets misprice volatility in close races.
